name: Spunky
description:
Made for the WASM-4 game jam. Best played on desktop.

arrows: move

space, x: jump

z: reset (new level, new score)

Still very prototype-ish and rough around the edges, but thank you for playing!

Assets are from the amazing "2bit Mini Pack" by kill4spika on itch.

Heavily inspired by Spelunky

Made using Roland, my own work-in-progress programming language.
